Working makes life better.

Cease to struggle and you cease to live, and play life on hard mode.

I am Yong Yuan, an Computer Vision Algorithm Engineer in KuaiShou (MeiTuan->KuaiShou). I completed my master's degree in University of Chinese Academy of Sciences on June 22, 2016 and bachelor's degree in Faculty of Science at Xidian University of science and technology of the electronics information on July 1，2013.

My work interests cover Content-based Image Retrieval (four years experience), Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Web Development Based on Django, and Scientific Computing with Python.

I support open source(@willard-yuan), love Linux and Python. In my free time, I dive into writing, translating English book about technology, reading books to improve myself.
